comments.body:
I the long run we need a way to tell the pinning script to ignore feedstocks we don't want to update the pin automatically.
(Not a problem now b/c the pinning script is broken :smile:)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +23,27 @@    - toolchain
    - gcc  # [osx]
    - boost 1.63.*  # note this is intentionally NOT the latest version; synced with casacore which has special needs
    - casacore 2.2.*
    - numpy x.x
